attributes.action: Give help and  support for people  with their energy bills
attributes.additional_details:
It's disgraceful that members of parliament and government employees etc  so the daily mail online alleges that MPs are claiming thousands of pounds in energy expenses for 2nd homes while claiming they could not help people on legacy benefits, people  with covid expenses people on low-income snd the most vulnerable in society 

Its seems the government are more focused on living s high-class lifestyle than looking after the most vulnerable in society .
attributes.background: People are going to endure 51% increase in their energy bills from April 2022, they are going to have to either eat or Heat

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the cost of energy bills, however it's not clear what specific forms of 'help and support' you want the Government to provide.

If there was a specific form of support you wanted the Government to introduce, such as a grant scheme, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Cut the VAT charged on energy bills': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470

'Cut VAT on domestic electricity to zero': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594293

'Hold an urgent inquiry into the energy crisis, and remove VAT on fuel': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605609

'Remove VAT from all domestic fuel, and provide price capping on heating oil.: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598647

'Hold an inquiry into fuel prices and introduce increased regulation': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603624
